name: UnilateralMastectomy
title: Unilateral Mastectomy
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes to identify a unilateral mastectomy.),(Data Element Scope: This value set was intended to identify patients who had a unilateral mastectomy.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes codes that indicate a unilateral mastectomy.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes codes that indicate a left, right or bilateral mastectomy.)
